name: Shrugging|WaterLord|EarthLord
script:
if ak.ai() then return end
if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then 
   if affstrack.score.weariness>0 then 
     if ak.thoughtIhad then ak.thoughtIhad("weariness") else affstrack.score.weariness = 0 end 
   end
   ak.cure.passive()
end
matches: ^([\w'\-]+) hunches (?:her|his) shoulders and lets out a soft hiss.
^The amorphous form of ([\w'\-]+) trembles\, some of the liquid composing it falling away from the greater whole\.$
^Magma erupts forth from beneath the plates that cover ([\w'\-]+)\.$
